pathAssistantSteps.info:
From First Contact to Negotiation


You'll not be able to move to the next stage unless the following fields are populated:


  • First-contact on
  • The merchant needs to have at least 1 contact with role = "Business". You need a phone number, and email or a professional network (LinkedIn)



At any time, you can move to "not relevant" and come back. Make sure to select a "Challenging Point", and update "Onboarding Type". And add a Prioritization score feedback if Prioritization Tag isn't empty.

At any time, you can move to "Future Partnership", you need to select a "challenging point". You can come back to 1st contact.
ï»¿At any time, you can move out of "Future Partnership", you can only come back to First-Contact.

From Identification to First Contact


You'll not be able to move to the next stage unless all these elements are populated :


  • Profile
  • Account source
  • Region
  • Country
  • Billing Country
  • Merchant Owner


At any time, you can move to "not relevant" and come back. Make sure to select a "Challenging Point", and update "Onboarding Type". And add a Prioritization score feedback if Prioritization Tag isn't empty.

At any time, you can move to "Future Partnership", you need to select a "challenging point". You can come back to 1st contact.

From Negotiation to Onboarding


You'll not be able to move to the next stage unless the following fields are populated:


  • P.K.


When ending the negotiation and starting the onboarding, you'll need to update the stage to the next step.

At this moment, an onboarding process will be automatically created: go to the "Onboarding Process" tab, on the very top of the page to find back your merchant and manage his onboarding properly.

🧐 When your merchant is offline, this usually means that he has been exited from the platform.


Reminder: It is not because your merchant is offline that he should not deal with customer requests related to products under warranty.

From Onboarding to Run.


During this stage, you have to complete the onboarding process.

The merchant will be pushed to Run stage as soon as the Onboarding process is completed.

Go to the "Onboarding Process" tab, on the very top of the page to find back your merchant and manage his onboarding properly.
